name: ..But is it Art?
description:
..But is it Art?

1-week Art Jam project for Bachelor of Games Development.

  • Inspired by still photos of silhouettes and ghostly forms
    • 'The blue kingdom' by Jay Younger. 1987
  • Further inspired by a looping stop-motion video of a backlit Samoan dancer
    • 'Siva in Motion' by Yuki Kihara. 2012

Underlines the transient nature of all material form and how our imagination adds to what our eyes see...

All is not as it appears.
